name: The Usher Foundation IX: The Corruption
name_original: The Usher Foundation IX: The Corruption
description:
Trigger warnings at end of description

A fan game for Rusty Quill's The Magnus Archives podcast.

Anything that's been locked in a storage unit this long must be dead, right?

The Magnus Archives is my favorite podcast, so I thought it would be cool to make a short fan game or two. Also a good excuse to explore more form stuff with Twine! 

Trigger Warnings: parasites, trypophobia, minor self harm
